tasks.task: Loading dirt onto the trailer
subtasks: Guide the tractor to the dirt pile
Attach the dirt scoop to the front of the tractor
Lower the dirt scoop into the dirt pile
Manipulate the dirt scoop to gather dirt
Lift the loaded dirt scoop onto the trailer
Secure the dirt on the trailer

tasks.task: Driving the tractor to another location
subtasks: Adjust the steering of the tractor
Increase or decrease speed of the tractor
Navigate around obstacles or terrain

tasks.task: Emptying the trailer onto the ground
subtasks: Position the trailer near the designated area
Lower the trailer deck to access the dirt
Remove dirt from the trailer using a shovel or similar tool
Distribute the dirt evenly on the ground

tasks.task: Attaching a rake to the tractor
subtasks: Locate the appropriate rake attachment
Connect the rake to the tractor's hydraulic system
Position the tractor with the rake over the area to be worked
Raise the rake to the desired height
Guide the tractor forward to drag the rake across the soil
Repeat the process over the necessary area

tasks.task: Using the plow to turn over soil
subtasks: Coupling the plow to the tractor
Align the plow with the start point of the field
Lower the plow to the ground
Activate the plow to break the soil
Drive the tractor forward to move the plow through the soil
Turn the tractor and plow to continue the rows
Repeat until the entire area is plowed

tasks.task: Attaching the hay rake and turning hay
subtasks: Position the hay rake to the proper height
Engage the hay rake and pull hay into the machine
Drive the tractor forward to move the hay towards the center
Release the hay from the rake into the hay shed

tasks.task: Feeding the hay into the hay baler
subtasks: Guide the tractor and baler to the area with hay
Carefully align the baler with the hay windrow
Start the hay baler and engage the cutting mechanism
Progressively feed the baler with hay as it forms a bale
Release the bale when it is the correct size
Repeat the process for additional bales
Proceeding to write MAINTASKs and SUBTASKs accordingly.
